verses.verse: Behold <S%H3117><s%>, a day of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>, when thy <S%H7998>spoil<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> in the midst of <S%H7130>thee<s%>.

For I will <S%H622>gather<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>; and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%>, and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H8155>rifled<s%>, and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H7901>ravished<s%>; and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity<s%>, and the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Then shall <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against those <S%H1471>nations<s%>, as <S%H3117>when<s%> he <S%H3898>fought<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%>.

And his <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%>; and the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives<s%> shall be <S%H1234>cleft<s%> in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> thereof toward the <S%H4217>east<s%> and toward the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1516>valley<s%>; and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall <S%H4185>remove<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> of it toward the <S%H5045>south<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of my <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; for the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5060>reach<s%> unto <S%H682>Azel<s%>; <S%H5127>yea<s%>, ye shall flee, like as ye <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and all the holy ones with <S%H6918>thee<s%>.
And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that there shall not be <S%H216>light<s%>; the <S%H3368>bright<s%> ones shall withdraw <S%H7087>themselves<s%>:

but it shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> which is <S%H3045>known<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; not <S%H3117>day<s%>, and not <S%H3915>night<s%>; but it shall come to <S%H6153>pass<s%>, that at evening <S%H6256>time<s%> there shall be <S%H216>light<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%H2677>half<s%> of them toward the <S%H6931>eastern<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them toward the <S%H314>western<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>: in <S%H7019>summer<s%> and in winter shall it <S%H2779>be<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be <S%H4428>King<s%> over all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H259>one<s%>, and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>.

All the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be made like the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%>, from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> to <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and she shall be lifted <S%H7213>up<s%>, and shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in her <S%H4725>place<s%>, from <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>'s <S%H8179>gate<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, unto the <S%H6434>corner<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananel<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3342>wine-presses<s%>.
And men shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2764>therein<s%>, and there shall be no more curse; but <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>.

And this shall be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> wherewith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that have <S%H6633>warred<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> while they <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H2356>sockets<s%>, and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall consume <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4103>tumult<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be among <S%H2388>them<s%>; and they shall lay hold every <S%H376>one<s%> on the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall rise <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> also shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> shall be gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H899>apparel<s%>, in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7230>abundance<s%>.

And so shall be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse<s%>, of the <S%H6505>mule<s%>, of the <S%H1581>camel<s%>, and of the <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and of all the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that shall be in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H4264>camps<s%>, as that <S%H4046>plague<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3498>pass<s%>, that every one that is left of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1767>from<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>.

And it shall <S%H4940>be<s%>, that whoso of all the families of the <S%H776>earth<s%> goeth not <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, upon them there shall be no <S%H1653>rain<s%>.

And if the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> go not <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H4046>not<s%>, neither shall it be upon them; there shall be the plague wherewith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that go not <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>.

This shall be the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that go not <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be upon the <S%H4698>bells<s%> of the <S%H5483>horses<s%>, <S%H6944>HOLY<s%> UNTO <S%H3068>JEHOVAH<s%>; and the <S%H5518>pots<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be like the <S%H4219>bowls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

Yea <S%H5518><s%>, every pot in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; and all they that <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> of <S%H1310>them<s%>, and boil <S%H3117>therein<s%>: and in that day there shall be no more a <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
